explanation: [0-0] In a crowded football stadium, spectators are excitedly clapping their hands. A player in a white jersey is walking out of a tunnel on the side of the pitch, with a man in a black uniform standing next to a black bench on the left.

[0-6] The player in the white jersey walks out of the tunnel onto the green grass, raises his hands and waves to the front left, then claps his hands and faces forward, finally turns around and continues to clap, walking onto the blue carpet.

[0-6] The player in the white jersey walks out of the tunnel onto the green grass, raises his hands and waves to the front left, then claps his hands and faces forward, finally turns around and continues to clap, walking onto the blue carpet.

[6-13] He continues to clap his hands with his hands raised, walking backward. The camera follows him, then the picture shows a large blue screen on the side of the pitch, where a man in a black suit is clapping. Security personnel in black uniforms and matching hats are standing around the pitch. After taking a few steps backward, the player in the white jersey turns around and continues to walk forward with a smile. At this time, the big screen is projecting the cheering and applauding audience, some staff members with work cards are holding cameras, standing on the blue carpet under the screen and on the side of the pitch, aiming the camera at the player in the white jersey. In front of the player in the white jersey, a curly-haired man in black and white clothes is holding a camera facing the player in the white jersey. He walks backwards and then motions the player in the white jersey forward with his right hand. As they walk forward, a man in black on the right side of the curly-haired man also aims his camera at the player in the white jersey. Finally, the player in the white jersey raises his arms in the air again and waves to the audience.
